Comment: *From Bloomberg News reporters Daniel Flatley and Natalia Drozdiak:*  The deal will grant the US privileged access to new investment projects to develop Ukraine‚Äôs natural resources including aluminum, graphite, oil and natural gas.  It‚Äôs been seen as critical to nurturing Trump‚Äôs goodwill toward Kyiv as his administration pushes to end the war that began when Russia mounted its full-scale invasion of Ukraine more than three years ago.  After weeks of Ukrainian and US officials wrangling over the text, momentum toward a breakthrough was building early this week, with Ukrainian negotiators visiting Washington to iron out final details.
